app.initError: Failed to initialize the app. Please restart.

settings.exportImportDescription: Export or import your passwords and categories
settings.exportDescription: Export your passwords and categories to an encrypted file. First, you'll be shown your private key that you must save securely.
settings.importDescription: Import your passwords and categories from an encrypted file. You'll need to provide the private key first, then select the file.
settings.enterSaltDescription: Enter the private key that was provided when exporting the data. This key is necessary to decrypt the information.
settings.exportWithSaltSuccess: Data exported with encryption key. Keep this file secure.
settings.exportWithoutSaltSuccess: Data exported without encryption key. You can only import it on this device.
settings.importWithSaltSuccess: Your data has been imported and re-encrypted with your current key
settings.importWithSaltError: Error importing with external key. Verify that the key is correct.
settings.saltWarning: ATTENTION! SAVE THIS KEY IN A SECURE PLACE
settings.saltInstructions: This private key is necessary to decrypt your data if you need to import it on another device. Without it, you won't be able to recover your passwords.
settings.selectFileDescription: Select the JSON file containing your encrypted data.
settings.title: Settings
settings.biometricDescription: Use fingerprint or face recognition to log in
settings.autoLockDescription: Lock the app after a period of inactivity
settings.exportDataDescription: Export your categories and passwords to an encrypted file
settings.importDataDescription: Import categories and passwords from an exported file
settings.exportSuccessMessage: Your data has been successfully exported. Keep this file in a safe place.
settings.importSuccessMessage: The data has been successfully imported.
settings.importConfirmMessage: This action will import categories and passwords from an exported file. You will need the unique key of the user who exported the data. Do you want to continue?

passwords.title: Secure Passwords
passwords.name: Title
passwords.noPasswordsDescription: No passwords saved. Create a new password.

categories.title: Categories
categories.deleteCategoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the category '{name}'?

register.title: Create Account
register.termsAgreement: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
